trans-unit.source: Exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref> that is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Beschrijft de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>van een <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"> </xref> die zich in een <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> naar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>in de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"> </xref> dat is gekoppeld aan dit <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>

trans-unit.target: De kolom die is gekoppeld aan de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The automation peer for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: De automation peer voor de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter"> </xref> die is gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the header that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt het besturingselementtype voor de header die is gekoppeld aan dit <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode wordt aangeroepen door <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> opsommingswaarde.

trans-unit.source: Gets a name that differentiates the header that is represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Een naam die de header die wordt vertegenwoordigd door dit onderscheidt opgehaald <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode wordt aangeroepen door <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: The type name of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*> property that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: De typenaam van de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>eigenschap die is gekoppeld aan dit <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Retourneert het object dat ondersteuning biedt voor het patroon opgegeven besturingselement van het element dat is gekoppeld aan deze automation peer.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> object: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> can be sorted.
trans-unit.target: Als een van de volgende gevallen optreedt, deze methode retourneert de huidige <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>object:- `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>en de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>-object dat is gekoppeld aan dit <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>kunnen worden gesorteerd.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> can be resized by the user.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>en de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>-object dat is gekoppeld aan dit <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>kan worden gewijzigd door de gebruiker.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Een inventarisatiewaarde die het patroon van het besturingselement.

trans-unit.source: The current object, if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: De huidige object, als patternInterface ondersteunde waarde is; anders .

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Zie Opmerkingen voor meer informatie.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Haalt een waarde die aangeeft of het element dat is gekoppeld aan deze automation peer gegevens bevat die wordt weergegeven voor de gebruiker.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>in alle gevallen.

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.
trans-unit.target: Verzendt een aanvraag voor het activeren van een besturingselement en de afzonderlijke, niet-ambigue actie start.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dit lid is een expliciete interface lid-implementatie.
